entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is introduced as someone who has a plan and wants to share pointers with Harry. He lowers his voice conspiratorially and winks at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the underdog in the situation. He seems hesitant to accept help from Bagman and has a plan worked out.

relationships.description: Bagman offers to share pointers with Harry, but Harry declines.
Bagman winks at Harry while offering him help.
